content.rendered:
2018 Sugar Bowl Standard
Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a standard package including three nights hotel stay and entry level tickets for the Sugar Bowl. You can further customize your package with tickets to additional events, ticket upgrades, extra nights, day tours, room upgrades and other add-ons.
HotelRoom CategoryPackages From
Embassy Suites by Hilton  New Orleans Convention Center2-Room Suite$1,285
JW Marriott New OrleansStandard Room$1,645
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until two months prior to departure. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
